bwwExcerpt: The Roundabout Theatre Company is putting on 'Trouble in Mind' in its 740-seat American Airlines Theatre with a deluxe cast led by LaChanze and Chuck Cooper, and the results are glorious to behold. George S. Kaufman is said to have quipped that 'satire is what closes on Saturday night,' but if this one doesn't draw crowds all the way to the end of its limited run, I'll be shocked.
